---
title: "template"
output: html_document
params:
  obj_list: !r list()
  titles: !r vector()

---

**Date: `r lubridate::today()`**

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
```

```{r, include = TRUE, echo = F}


plot_tabplot = function( tabplot, title){
  
  tabplot:::plot.tabplot(tabplot, title = title)
  
}

tibble( tabplot = params$obj_list
        , title = params$titles   ) %>%
  mutate( plot = walk2( tabplot, title, plot_tabplot ) 
  )

```
